text: Le Val-d'Ocre () is a commune in the Yonne department of central France. The municipality was made on 1 January 2016 by merger of communes of Saint-Aubin- Château-Neuf and Saint-Martin-sur-Ocre.Arrêté préfectoral 8 December 2015 == References == Category:2016 establishments in France Category:Communes in Yonne
title: Le Val-d'Ocre
